languages.text: "Слухи пересказывать не буду, а правды не ведаю. Что-то на редкость злобное — и корабли пропадали, и целые торговые конвои. Эту систему большим крюком облетали, пока Лорд-инквизитор не наведался в нее да не умиротворил. С тех пор, кстати, и слухов о ней особо не стало — Инквизиция позаботилась, чтобы пустотники почем зря не болтали. Видать, что-то богохульное, враждебное разуму людскому оттуда перло!"

"I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Слухи пересказывать не буду, а правды не ведаю. Что-то на редкость злобное — и корабли пропадали, и целые торговые конвои. Эту систему большим крюком облетали, пока Лорд-инквизитор не наведался в нее да не умиротворил. С тех пор, кстати, и слухов о ней особо не стало — Инквизиция позаботилась, чтобы пустотники почем зря не болтали. Видать, что-то богохульное, враждебное разуму людскому оттуда перло!"

traits.locale_text: "I won't be telling the rumours all over again, but the truth is also unknown to me. There is something exceptionally malicious: sometimes ships disappeared, and sometimes entire trade convoys did. This system used to be avoided long distances away until Lord Inquisitor paid his visit here and brought it to peace. By the way, since then rumours about it fell quiet, too. The Inquisition made sure voidsmen wouldn't talk too much. Seems like something tainted and hostile for the mind of a man burst out there!"

"I won't be telling the rumours all over again, but the truth is also unknown to me. There is something exceptionally malicious: sometimes ships disappeared, and sometimes entire trade convoys did. This system used to be avoided long distances away until Lord Inquisitor paid his visit here and brought it to peace. By the way, since then rumours about it fell quiet, too. The Inquisition made sure voidsmen wouldn't talk too much. Seems like something tainted and hostile for the mind of a man burst out there!"

"I won't be recounting the rumours, as the truth is unknown to me. There is something exceptionally sinister about it; we've heard of ships and even entire trade convoys disappearing. This system used to be avoided at all costs until Lord Inquisitor paid his visit here and pacified it. Since then, all rumours about it fell quiet, too — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Seems like something tainted and antagonistic burst out of there!"

"I won't be recounting the rumours, as the truth is unknown to me. There is something exceptionally sinister about it; we've heard of ships and even entire trade convoys disappearing. This system used to be avoided at all costs until Lord Inquisitor paid his visit here and pacified it. Since then, all rumours about it fell quiet, too — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Seems like something tainted and antagonistic burst out of there!"

"I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."

languages.text: “我不想重复那些传言，因为我也不清楚真相，但传得非常吓人。大家说一开始是几艘飞船不见了，后来是整支贸易舰队都失踪了。在那之后，大家就尽量离这个星系远点，后来大审判官本人来到这里，把问题解决了。在那之后，那些传言就慢慢停止了，确切地说，是审判庭让那些人闭了嘴。虽然不知道的这扇门里之前蹿出过什么东西，但肯定不是什么好东西，对人类来说肯定非常危险。”
languages.original_text: "I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “我不想重复那些传言，因为我也不清楚真相，但传得非常吓人。大家说一开始是几艘飞船不见了，后来是整支贸易舰队都失踪了。在那之后，大家就尽量离这个星系远点，后来大审判官本人来到这里，把问题解决了。在那之后，那些传言就慢慢停止了，确切地说，是审判庭让那些人闭了嘴。虽然不知道的这扇门里之前蹿出过什么东西，但肯定不是什么好东西，对人类来说肯定非常危险。”

languages.text: « La vérité m'est inconnue et je préfère m'abstenir de colporter de simples rumeurs, mais elles n'augurent rien de bon. Des vaisseaux et des convois commerciaux entiers auraient disparu sans laisser de traces. Résultat, les capitaines se sont mis à éviter le système, jusqu'au jour où le seigneur inquisiteur en personne s'est déplacé pour régler la question. Depuis lors, on n'en a presque plus entendu parler, preuve que l'Inquisition s'est arrangée pour faire taire les cosmomarins. Quoi que le portail ait recraché alors, tout porte à croire que c'était quelque chose d'impie, et un danger pour l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité m'est inconnue et je préfère m'abstenir de colporter de simples rumeurs, mais elles n'augurent rien de bon. Des vaisseaux et des convois commerciaux entiers auraient disparu sans laisser de traces. Résultat, les capitaines se sont mis à éviter le système, jusqu'au jour où le seigneur inquisiteur en personne s'est déplacé pour régler la question. Depuis lors, on n'en a presque plus entendu parler, preuve que l'Inquisition s'est arrangée pour faire taire les cosmomarins. Quoi que le portail ait recraché alors, tout porte à croire que c'était quelque chose d'impie, et un danger pour l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Ich will die Gerüchte nicht wiederholen, und ich will die Wahrheit nicht wissen, aber es war übel. Es hieß, dass Schiffe und sogar ganze Handelskonvois verschwinden. Captains fingen an, das System zu meiden, bis irgendwann der Großinquisitor herkam und kurzen Prozess mit dem Artefakt machte. Seitdem gibt es kaum mehr Gerüchte – die Inquisition sorgte dafür, dass die Raumbewohner Stillschweigen bewahrten. Was das Tor auch ausgespuckt haben mag, es muss profan und eine Gefahr für die Menschheit gewesen sein."
languages.original_text: "I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will die Gerüchte nicht wiederholen, und ich will die Wahrheit nicht wissen, aber es war übel. Es hieß, dass Schiffe und sogar ganze Handelskonvois verschwinden. Captains fingen an, das System zu meiden, bis irgendwann der Großinquisitor herkam und kurzen Prozess mit dem Artefakt machte. Seitdem gibt es kaum mehr Gerüchte – die Inquisition sorgte dafür, dass die Raumbewohner Stillschweigen bewahrten. Was das Tor auch ausgespuckt haben mag, es muss profan und eine Gefahr für die Menschheit gewesen sein."

languages.text: «No quiero andar repitiendo rumores, y tampoco quiero saber la verdad: basta saber que era grave. Desaparecían naves e incluso convoyes enteros. Los capitanes empezaron a evitar el sistema hasta que llegó el Lord Inquisidor y resolvió el problema en un periquete. Desde entonces, corren pocos rumores. La Inquisición sabe hacer que los navegantes del vacío cierren la boca. Sea lo que sea que saliera por ese portal, debía de ser algo blasfemo y peligroso para la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «No quiero andar repitiendo rumores, y tampoco quiero saber la verdad: basta saber que era grave. Desaparecían naves e incluso convoyes enteros. Los capitanes empezaron a evitar el sistema hasta que llegó el Lord Inquisidor y resolvió el problema en un periquete. Desde entonces, corren pocos rumores. La Inquisición sabe hacer que los navegantes del vacío cierren la boca. Sea lo que sea que saliera por ese portal, debía de ser algo blasfemo y peligroso para la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「噂を広めたくはないし、真実はわからないが、酷い状況だった。船や輸送船団が消えたという情報もあった。中隊長はこの星系を避けるようになり、最終的にはロード・インクィジターがここにやってきて、手早く片付けてしまった。異端審問庁はヴォイズマンが口を閉ざすよう仕向けた。それ以来、あまり噂を聞かなくなった。ゲートから出てくるもの全てが、冒涜的で人類にとって危険なものだったに違いないさ」
languages.original_text: "I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「噂を広めたくはないし、真実はわからないが、酷い状況だった。船や輸送船団が消えたという情報もあった。中隊長はこの星系を避けるようになり、最終的にはロード・インクィジターがここにやってきて、手早く片付けてしまった。異端審問庁はヴォイズマンが口を閉ざすよう仕向けた。それ以来、あまり噂を聞かなくなった。ゲートから出てくるもの全てが、冒涜的で人類にとって危険なものだったに違いないさ」

languages.text: "Rivayetleri tekrarlamak istemem, hakikati de bilmiyorum ama hayli fenalarmış. Dediklerine göre gemiler hatta koca ticaret konvoyları kayboluyormuş. Kaptanlar sistemden kaçınmaya başlamış ama sonunda Lord Engizisyoncu gelip meselenin icabına bakmış. Ondan beri pek bir söylenti çıkmadı. Engizisyon sağ olsun, uçsuz erleri çıt çıkarmıyor. Geçitten gelen o mahluklar her ne ise habis ve İnsanlık düşmanı oldukları aşikâr."
languages.original_text: "I don't want to repeat the rumours and I don't know the truth, but it was bad. There was word of ships and even whole trade convoys disappearing. Captains started avoiding the system, until eventually the Lord Inquisitor came here and made short work of it. Hasn't been much in the way of rumours ever since, actually — the Inquisition made sure voidsmen kept their mouths shut. Whatever the gate used to spew out, it must have been profane and a danger to Humanity."
